questions.question: What is the main purpose of this serum?
questions.answer: It is a brightening serum designed to fade dark spots and improve overall skin radiance.

questions.question: What is the concentration of Vitamin C in the serum?
Which skin types is this serum suitable for?
questions.answer: It is suitable for Oily, Combination skin.

questions.question: How should I apply this serum?
questions.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

questions.question: Can I use this serum every morning?
questions.answer: Yes, it is intended for morning use before sunscreen as part of your daily routine.

questions.question: Should I apply moisturizer after using this serum?
questions.answer: Yes, you may follow the serum with a suitable moisturizer and then sunscreen.

questions.question: Can this serum cause irritation?
questions.answer: It may cause mild tingling, especially for sensitive skin. If irritation persists, discontinue use.

questions.question: Is this serum safe for sensitive skin?
questions.answer: Sensitive skin may experience mild tingling. It is recommended to do a patch test before full-face application.

questions.question: Can I use this serum with other active ingredients?
questions.answer: It is generally best to avoid layering multiple strong actives in the same routine without guidance from a skincare professional.

questions.question: What is the price of this serum?
Is this serum suitable for everyday use at its price point?
questions.answer: Yes, the price and formulation are designed for consistent, everyday use as part of a regular skincare routine.

questions.question: How does this serum differ from a gel-based Vitamin C product?
questions.answer: This serum focuses on brightening and fading dark spots with 10% Vitamin C and hydrating Hyaluronic Acid, while gel-based products may offer a lighter texture with slightly different supporting ingredients.

questions.question: Is this serum better for oily skin than heavier Vitamin C creams?
questions.answer: Yes, it is more suitable for oily and combination skin compared to heavier creams that may feel greasy.

questions.question: How does this serum compare to products that do not contain Hyaluronic Acid?
questions.answer: Compared to products without Hyaluronic Acid, this serum also supports skin hydration in addition to brightening and dark spot reduction.

questions.question: What are the key ingredients in this serum?
questions.answer: The key ingredients are Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid.
